class.name: CFFICallableFunction
class.brief_description: A native function that invokes a user provided [Callable].
class.description: Instances of [CFFICallableFunction] can be created with [method CFFIScope.create_function]. [b]Warning:[/b] you are responsible for keeping this instance alive while native code has access to it. Attepting to invoke a released instance from native code is undefined behavior.

members.member: [Callable] that will be called whenever the native function is invoked.
